review_blob: cereal aroma in this blonde beer, nothing special from the appearance point of view; taste is nice but in the ordinary: overall a typical belgian blonde.

hay, cereal aroma. amber, hazy, minimal head, looks nice.
light sweetness, medium bitterness.medium body, soft carbonation. Overall an easy satisfying beer.

Vom fass, in most of the biergarten in Munich. Also tried several times in bottle. Aroma very light, no strong influence. Appearance is golden, relatively hazy. Mostly sweet taste, with a hint of bitter. Light body, with average carbonation.
Overall is amazing in his kind, unforgettable and perfect with the traditional bavarian meat. Outstanding during a hot summer day.
